actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the general revision of the copyright law, title 17 of the United States Code, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Title I: General Revision of Copyright Law - Provides for the general revision of the Copyright Law, title 17 of the United States Code. Title II: Protection of Ornamental Designs of Useful Articles - Design Protection Act - Provides that the author or other proprietor of an original ornamental design of a useful article may obtain the protection of this title by complying with the enumerated provisions of the title.

titles.title: A bill for the general revision of the copyright law, title 17 of the United States Code, and for other purposes.
